name: Lizardfolk
description: Lizardfolk are semi-aquatic reptilian humanoids who are fiercely territorial and pragmatic. They see the world in terms of predator and prey.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet, and you have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

traits.name: Bite
traits.description: Your fanged maw is a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with it, you deal piercing damage equal to 1d6 + your Strength modifier.

traits.name: Cunning Artisan
traits.description: As part of a short rest, you can harvest bone and hide from a slain beast, construct, dragon, monstrosity, or plant creature of size Small or larger to create one of the following items: a shield, a club, a javelin, or 1d4 darts or pieces of ammunition. To use this trait, you need a blade, such as a dagger, or appropriate artisan's tools.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.description: You can hold your breath for up to 15 minutes.

traits.name: Hunter's Lore
traits.description: You gain proficiency with two of the following skills of your choice: Animal Handling, Nature, Perception, Stealth, and Survival.

traits.name: Natural Armor
traits.description: You have tough, scaly skin. When you aren't wearing armor, your AC is 13 + your Dexterity modifier.

traits.name: Hungry Jaws
traits.description: As a bonus action, you can make a special attack with your bite. If the attack hits, it deals its normal damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier. You canâ€™t use this trait again until you finish a short or long rest.
